document.full_text: it is hard to think of another stage musical that piles one blissful number on top of another with such escalating force, and the production at the gateway playhouse serves it up well.
document.title: theater review | long island: the menacing passion of 'west side story'
lines_and_colors: it is hard to think of another stage musical that piles one blissful number on top of another with such escalating force, and the production at the gateway playhouse serves it up well.
